thread.title: The Bok band wagon

author: news24.com
title: The Bok band wagon
text:
Every one that seems to have been quite for so many years, have jumped on the band wagon just before the World Cup.
Colour has not been such an issue in rugby from my point of view and no I’m not a racist.
I’ve been working in African countries most of my life and have been supporting the Boks from everywhere in the world.
I believe that we have great players from all colours, but it’s so easy getting some support for any matter where there is already some smoke, one person raises an issue to black players and now a country is infused.
The problem we have is that people still go on about colour, and do not care that we are one nation going to try and win the world cup....supposed to be. If colour has to be brought into sport do it across the board. Swimming, gymnastics, chess, badminton.
Our country is going to "%#$ and people focus on things that are not improving any of the daily matters, violence,corruption and so on. Stop blaming colour South Africa - if you are not able to change yourself you will never be able to change a country. People complaining about apartheid.... I don’t know apartheid and I’m sure the kids at varsity has even been less affected by it.
They have an opportunity to study but instead complain about it, Give me that opportunity to go to varsity man....Come right South Africa!!!
